```{r}
library(data.table)
library(glue)
library(kleptomoveMS)
```

```{r}
paths <- list.dirs("data_sim/for_landscape/", recursive = F)

# select gens
gens_for_figure <- stringr::str_pad(c(1, 50), width = 5, pad = "0")

# get paths for files
data_landscape <- CJ(
  gen = gens_for_figure,
  path = paths
)

# add sim_type
data_landscape[, sim_type := rep(c("facultative", "foragers", "obligate"), 2)]

# get paths
data_landscape$image <- glue_data(data_landscape, "{path}/{gen}.png")

# get data
data_landscape$data <- lapply(data_landscape$image,
  kleptomoveMS::read_landscape,
  layer = 4,
  crop_dim = 60,
  type = "items"
)

# convert gen to numeric
data_landscape[, gen := as.numeric(gen)]

# unlst
data_landscape <- data_landscape[, unlist(data, recursive = F),
  by = c("sim_type", "gen")
]

# save
fwrite(data_landscape,
       file = "data_sim/results/data_landscape_item_count_1_50.png")
```
